title: Historical Tales, Vol III: Spanish American
creator: Charles Morris
description: LibriVox recording of Historical Tales, Vol III: Spanish American, by Charles Morris. Read by Kalynda. Volume III of a series containing anecdotes and stories, some well-known, others less so, of particular countries. This third volume covers the discovery, colonization, founding, and early years of the countries of South America, describing history for children and young adults in an exciting and novel manner. (Summary by Kalynda) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; history; Latin America; Caribbean; children; young adult
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
